/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades adorned with colorful murals that add a touch of artistic flair to the cityscape. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves contrasting with the concrete structures. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The image is bathed in the light of day, illuminating the scene with natural daylight.
